ygData.subject: Tinkering skill max of 5 x (level - 15) seem to be true =(
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Fellow Gnomes, Here is an issue to immediately submit a /bug to Verant about. Apparently after spending a LOT of plat, it appears the rumor that the
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Fellow Gnomes,

Here is an issue to immediately submit a "/bug" to Verant about. Apparently after spending a LOT of plat, it appears the rumor that the skill level limit of 5 x (level-15) is true. Damn...

I am 35th, and can not get my skill above 100. Another 32nd level gnome beside me could not get his to raise about 85. I have heard other stories of gnomes not being able to break some unknown barrier when it came to tinkering.

What this basically does is allow the high level characters (who have most everything by now anyway), to corner the tinkering market. The failure rate of an aqua lung at a skill of 102, depending on your stats, is about 50% to 60%, which means unless you are 35th level or above you will have an unacceptable failure rate.

This is just not damn fair. No other trade in the game has a limit like this, and us tinkers have suffered enough. Make sure the first thing you do when you hop on next time is to "/bug" and "/suggestion" Verant about this totally preposterous skill limit.

Cheers,

Fizzwizz of tunare.

P.S. Verant Bastards
